short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Legal AI analyzes privacy policies in real-time, providing risk assessments across key privacy dimensions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Legal AI instantly analyzes website privacy policies using advanced AI to assess your digital privacy risks. Get clear insights across key privacy dimensions:

- Security & Data Protection:
Evaluates encryption, breach protocols, and data storage practices
Risk level based on security measures and vulnerabilities

- Data Collection & Usage:
Examines what personal data is gathered and how it's utilized
Highlights unexpected or concerning collection practices

- Third-Party Sharing:
Identifies which external partners receive your data
Reviews data transfer safeguards and recipient restrictions

- User Rights & Control:
Assesses data access, deletion, and portability options
Evaluates compliance with privacy regulations

For each category, receive:

- Risk Assessment: Color-coded severity level with detailed rationale
- Key Findings: Specific policy excerpts and implications
- Action Items: Recommended steps to protect your privacy

Make informed decisions about your online privacy with clear, AI-powered analysis of complex legal documents.

Install Legal AI to understand privacy policies at a glance and take control of your digital footprint.
